articles.content: New Delhi: The pretty-looking actress Kriti Kharbanda recently took to Instagram and posted a throwback pole dancing video of hers. She slayed in her act and regretted not fixing a pole at her house. The stunner, it seems has aced the skill on how to smoothly… [+819 chars]

articles.description: Nawazuddin Siddiqui-starrer Ghoomketu is the story of an inexperienced writer struggling to make it big in the Mumbai film industry.

articles.title: Video of the week: When late actor Rishi Kapoor danced at Imtiaz Ali's brother's wedding in Kashmir - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Rishi Kapoor and Imtiaz Ali worked together in Saif Ali Khan and Deepika Padukone's Love Aaj Kal. which was released in 2009. It also featured Neetu Kapoor in a cameo appearance.
articles.content: Veteran superstar Rishi Kapoor passed away on April 30 and his unsudden demise shocked the industry. Filmmaker Imtiaz Ali, who worked with the star in Saif Ali Khan and Deepika Padukone's Love Aaj Kal, remembered Rishi Kapoor and shared a throwback video of h… [+2195 chars]

articles.title: Relief to Kollywood: TN allows post-production work from May 11 - Deccan Chronicle
articles.description: Production houses should get the approvals from the concerned authorities before re-commencing their post-production activities.
articles.content: CHENNAI: In a measure of relief for the Kollywood film industry that is in dire straits with tens of crores of rupees blocked since the Covid-19 lockdown for the past 50 days, the Tamil Nadu government allowed resumption of post-production activities alone fr… [+1088 chars]

articles.description: Bollywood singer Neha Kakkar who began as a 'bhajan' singer talks about her life journey and the success she has received over the years. She has belted out hit songs like 'Dilbar,' 'Garmi,' 'Sunny Sunny,' 'Aankh maarey' and 'Badri ki dulhania.'
